mapper.select: select * from com_form a left join com_form_right b on a.form_id = b.form_id where a.FORM_ID = #{formId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

select * from com_form a left join com_form_right b on a.form_id = b.form_id
a.FORM_NAME like CONCAT('%',#{formName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
a.PRGROUP like CONCAT('%',#{prgroup,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
order by a.prgroup
select FORM_ID, FORM_NAME from com_form order by form_id
